channel.title: Scroll Bar Color
channel.description:
I feel like a giant noob having this as my first post but I haven't had anything to add to other threads...
Well anyway, on with my point. I am making graphical changes as well as many new models to my client. I however cannot find any way to change the color of the scroll bar.
Sorry for being a complete noob, but here's an image if you didn't under stand the above.

item.title: Scroll Bar Color
item.dc:creator: @Maticus Maticus
item.description:

Well anyway, on with my point.
I am making graphical changes as well as many new models to my client. I however cannot find any way to change the color of the scroll bar.

Sorry for being a complete noob, but here’s an image if you didn’t under stand the above.
